column5: Flew out of Sioux Lookout on the morn of sept 24 and stopped at Miniss to check some moose hunters at the cabin http://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09570.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09571.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09572.jpg from there we went to root bay on the west end of st johttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09343.jpg we then took off and headed to Eagle island and our home for a weekhttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09574.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09575.jpg out on the lake we went and headed for miniss bay and the river coming inhttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09578.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09579.jpg caught tons of fish at the second rapids....mostly pesky small northern and walleye under 20 in....here is the pool below the second rapidshttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09581.jpg that was pretty much it for the first day since we got a late start.The weather was nice for 3 days then turned cold and windy for 3 days,it finely let up enough to fly out on the last morn. We couldent get out one whole day the wind was that bad...when we did get out the fishing was fantastic..the lake was 4 foot high and falling slowly..water surface temp was 63-64 best bait was a 3/8 oz jig with oversize barbless hook and a 5 in white gulp alive jerk shad we caught many 23-25 in fish out on the main lake here are some more pics When they built the root river diversion channel the workers stayed on the lake in a camp,like a town time forgothttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09590.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09591.jpghttp://i26.photobucket.com/albums/c1...0/DSC09592.jpg
some how the 2nd half of my post vanished i will try again tomorrow
